Attacks.Name: Fiery Wrath
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Galarian Moltres gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Hex special condition.

Attacks.Name: Gale of Darkness
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, enemy characters within Range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage and gain the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Oblivion Wing
Attacks.Effect: Galarian Moltres heals damage equal to half of the damage dealt by this attack (rounding down).

Superpowers.Name: Berserk
Superpowers.Effect: If Galarian Moltres suffers damage from an enemy attack and is not Dazed, it gains 1 additional power.

Superpowers.Name: Shadow Flight
Superpowers.Effect: Galarian Moltres may advance M. After the advance, enemy characters within Range 2 gain the Hex and Incinerate special conditions.

Attacks.Name: Dark Inferno
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, the target gains the Stun and Incinerate special conditions. Galarian Moltres heals 2 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Dark Rebirth
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 3 damage from Galarian Moltres. After using this superpower, Galarian Moltres gains the Stagger special condition.
